trans-unit.source: Display utility classes that apply to all breakpoints, from xs to xxl, have no breakpoint abbreviation in them. This is because those classes are applied from min-width: 0; and up, and thus are not bound by a media query. The remaining breakpoints, however, do include a breakpoint abbreviation.

Display utility classes that apply to all breakpoints, from xs to xl, have no breakpoint abbreviation in them. This is because those classes are applied from min-width: 0; and up, and thus are not bound by a media query. The remaining breakpoints, however, do include a breakpoint abbreviation.
trans-unit.target: 适用于从 xs 到 xl 的所有断点的 Display实用工具类中没有断点缩写。这是因为这些类从 min-width: 0; 以及更高版本，因此不受媒体查询的约束。但是，其余的断点确实包含断点的缩写。

trans-unit.source: Dividers
trans-unit.target: Dividers

trans-unit.source: Dividers are automatically added in CSS through ::before and content. They can be changed by modifying a local CSS custom property --bs-breadcrumb-divider, or through the $breadcrumb-divider Sass variable — and $breadcrumb-divider-flipped for its RTL counterpart, if needed. We default to our Sass variable, which is set as a fallback to the custom property. This way, you get a global divider that you can override without recompiling CSS at any time.

trans-unit.source: Documentation and examples for Bootstrap typography, including global settings, headings, body text, lists, and more.

trans-unit.source: Dropdowns are built on a third party library, Popper.js, which provides dynamic positioning and viewport detection. Be sure to include popper.min.js before Bootstrap’s JavaScript or use bootstrap.bundle.min.js / bootstrap.bundle.js which contains Popper.js. Popper.js isn’t used to position dropdowns in navbars though as dynamic positioning isn’t required.
trans-unit.target: 下拉列表基于第三方库Popper.js构建，该库提供了动态定位和视口检测。确保在Bootstrap的JavaScript之前包含popper.min.js或使用包含Popper.js的 bootstrap.bundle.min.js / bootstrap.bundle.js 。尽管不需要动态定位，但Popper.js并不用于在导航栏中定位下拉列表。

trans-unit.source: Dropdowns are built on a third party library, Popper, which provides dynamic positioning and viewport detection. Be sure to include popper.min.js before Bootstrap’s JavaScript or use bootstrap.bundle.min.js / bootstrap.bundle.js which contains Popper. Popper isn’t used to position dropdowns in navbars though as dynamic positioning isn’t required.

trans-unit.source: Dropped .center-block for the new .mx-auto class.
trans-unit.target: 下降 .center-block 新 .mx-auto 类。

trans-unit.source: Dropped .form-group-* classes for simplicity’s sake. Use .form-control-* classes instead now.
trans-unit.target: 下降 .form-group-* 类为简单起见。现在改用 .form-control-* 类。

trans-unit.source: Dropped .help-block and replaced it with .form-text for block-level help text. For inline help text and other flexible options, use utility classes like .text-muted.
trans-unit.target: 下降 .help-block ，并用它代替 .form-text 块级帮助文本。有关内联帮助文本和其他灵活选项，请使用实用程序类，如 .text-muted 。

trans-unit.source: Dropped .page-header as its styles can be applied via utilities.
trans-unit.target: 掉落 .page-header 作为其样式可以通过实用程序被应用。

trans-unit.source: Dropped .radio-inline and .checkbox-inline.
trans-unit.target: 下降 .radio-inline 和 .checkbox-inline 。

trans-unit.source: Dropped Bower support as the package manager has been deprecated for alternatives (e.g., Yarn or npm). See bower/bower#2298 for details.
trans-unit.target: 不再支持Bower，因为不推荐使用软件包管理器（例如Yarn或npm）。有关详细信息，请参见bower / bower＃2298。

trans-unit.source: Dropped IE8, IE9, and iOS 6 support. v4 is now only IE10+ and iOS 7+. For sites needing either of those, use v3.
trans-unit.target: 放弃了IE8、IE9和iOS6的支持,v4现在只有IE10+和iOS7+。对于需要其中之一的网站,请使用v3。

trans-unit.source: Dropped entirely for the new card component.
trans-unit.target: 完全放弃了新卡组件。

trans-unit.source: Dropped nearly all > selectors for simpler styling via un-nested classes.
trans-unit.target: 下跌几乎所有 > 对于通过非嵌套类简单的造型选择。

trans-unit.source: Dropped push and pull modifier classes for the new flexbox-powered order classes. For example, instead of .col-8.push-4 and .col-4.pull-8, you’d use .col-8.order-2 and .col-4.order-1.
trans-unit.target: 删除了新的由flexbox驱动的 order 类的推拉修饰符类。例如，使用 .col-8.order-2 和 .col-4.order-1 代替 .col-8.push-4 和 .col-4.pull-8 。

trans-unit.source: Dropped the .btn-group-xs class entirely given removal of .btn-xs.
trans-unit.target: 掉落的 .btn-group-xs 完全给出去除类 .btn-xs 。

trans-unit.source: Dropped the .btn-xs class entirely as .btn-sm is proportionally much smaller than v3’s.
trans-unit.target: 放弃了 .btn-xs 类完全是作为 .btn-sm 按比例比V3的小得多。

trans-unit.source: Dropped the .form-horizontal class requirement.
trans-unit.target: 删除了 .form-horizontal 类的要求。

trans-unit.source: Dropped the .navbar-form class entirely. It’s no longer necessary; instead, just use .form-inline and apply margin utilities as necessary.
trans-unit.target: 掉落的 .navbar-form 类完全。不再需要；相反，只需使用 .form-inline 并根据需要应用利润率实用程序。

trans-unit.source: Dropped the .pager component entirely as it was little more than customized outline buttons.
trans-unit.target: 完全 .pager 了.pager组件，因为它只不过是自定义的大纲按钮。

trans-unit.source: Dropped the bulk of .hidden-* utilities for new display utilities. For example, instead of .hidden-sm-up, use .d-sm-none. Renamed the .hidden-print utilities to use the display utility naming scheme. More info under the Responsive utilities section of this page.
trans-unit.target: 将大量的 .hidden-* 实用程序删除，用于新的显示实用程序。例如，使用 .d-sm-none 代替 .hidden-sm-up 。重命名了 .hidden-print 实用程序以使用显示实用程序的命名方案。在此页面的“ 响应实用程序”部分下的更多信息。

trans-unit.source: Dropped the online Customizer in favor of more extensive setup documentation and customized builds.
trans-unit.target: 放弃了在线定制器,转而使用更广泛的设置文档和定制构建。

trans-unit.source: Due to browser limitations, some of our plugins, namely Dropdown, Tooltip and Popover plugins, cannot be used in a <script> tag with module type because they depend on Popper. For more information about the issue see here.
Due to constraints in how CSS works, we cannot (at present) apply styles to a <label> that comes before a form control in the DOM without the help of custom JavaScript.
trans-unit.target: 由于CSS的工作方式的限制，我们（目前）不能在没有自定义JavaScript的帮助下将样式应用于DOM中的表单控件之前的 <label> 。

trans-unit.source: Due to how HTML5 defines its semantics, the autofocus HTML attribute has no effect in Bootstrap modals. To achieve the same effect, use some custom JavaScript:
trans-unit.target: 由于HTML5如何定义其语义，因此 autofocus HTML属性在Bootstrap模态中无效。为了达到相同的效果，请使用一些自定义JavaScript：

trans-unit.source: Due to the widespread use of <table> elements across third-party widgets like calendars and date pickers, Bootstrap’s tables are opt-in. Add the base class .table to any <table>, then extend with our optional modifier classes or custom styles. All table styles are not inherited in Bootstrap, meaning any nested tables can be styled independent from the parent.

Due to the widespread use of tables across third-party widgets like calendars and date pickers, we’ve designed our tables to be opt-in. Just add the base class .table to any <table>, then extend with custom styles or our various included modifier classes.
trans-unit.target: 由于跨日历，日期选择器之类的第三方小部件广泛使用表格，因此我们将表格设计为“ 选择加入”。只需将基类 .table 添加到任何 <table> 中，然后使用自定义样式或我们包含的各种修饰符类进行扩展。

trans-unit.source: Dynamic heights
trans-unit.target: 动态高度

trans-unit.source: Dynamic tabbed interfaces, as described in the WAI ARIA Authoring Practices, require role="tablist", role="tab", role="tabpanel", and additional aria- attributes in order to convey their structure, functionality and current state to users of assistive technologies (such as screen readers).
trans-unit.target: 动态标签的接口，如在所描述的WAI ARIA创作实践，需要 role="tablist" ， role="tab" ， role="tabpanel" ，并附加 aria- 属性以便传达其结构，功能和当前状态的用户辅助技术（例如屏幕阅读器）。

trans-unit.source: ESC
trans-unit.target: ESC

trans-unit.source: Each .ratio-* class includes a CSS custom property (or CSS variable) in the selector. You can override this CSS variable to create custom aspect ratios on the fly with some quick math on your part.

Each breakpoint was chosen to comfortably hold containers whose widths are multiples of 12. Breakpoints are also representative of a subset of common device sizes and viewport dimensions—they don’t specifically target every use case or device. Instead, the ranges provide a strong and consistent foundation to build on for nearly any device.
Each checkbox and radio <input> and <label> pairing is wrapped in a <div> to create our custom control. Structurally, this is the same approach as our default .form-check.
trans-unit.target: 每个复选框和单选 <input> 和 <label> 配对都包装在 <div> 中,以创建我们的自定义控件。从结构 .form-check ，这与我们的默认.form-check相同。

trans-unit.source: Each plugin also exposes its raw constructor on a Constructor property: $.fn.popover.Constructor. If you’d like to get a particular plugin instance, retrieve it directly from an element: $('[rel="popover"]').data('popover').
trans-unit.target: 每个插件还将其原始构造函数公开在 Constructor 属性上： $.fn.popover.Constructor 。如果要获取特定的插件实例，请直接从以下元素中检索它： $('[rel="popover"]').data('popover') 。

trans-unit.source: Easily change the vertical alignment of inline, inline-block, inline-table, and table cell elements.
trans-unit.target: 轻松改变inline、inline-block、inline-table和table单元格元素的垂直对齐方式。

trans-unit.source: Easily clear floats by adding .clearfixto the parent element. Can also be used as a mixin.
trans-unit.target: 通过将 .clearfix 添加到父元素中，可以轻松清除 float 。也可以用作mixin。

trans-unit.source: Easily extend form controls by adding text, buttons, or button groups on either side of textual inputs, custom selects, and custom file inputs.
trans-unit.target: 通过在文本输入、自定义选择和自定义文件输入的两侧添加文本、按钮或按钮组来轻松扩展表单控件。

trans-unit.source: Easily make an element as wide or as tall with our width and height utilities.
trans-unit.target: 使用我们的宽度和高度工具,可以轻松地使一个元素的宽度或高度。

trans-unit.source: Easily realign text to components with text alignment classes.
trans-unit.target: 使用文本对齐类轻松地重新调整文本到组件。

trans-unit.source: Easily realign text to components with text alignment classes. For start, end, and center alignment, responsive classes are available that use the same viewport width breakpoints as the grid system.
Either download Bootstrap’s sources or fork Bootstrap’s repository.
Elements with the .invisible class will be hidden both visually and for assistive technology/screen reader users.

Elements with the disabled attribute aren’t interactive, meaning users cannot focus, hover, or click them to trigger a tooltip (or popover). As a workaround, you’ll want to trigger the tooltip from a wrapper <div> or <span>, ideally made keyboard-focusable using tabindex="0", and override the pointer-events on the disabled element.
trans-unit.target: 具有 disabled 属性的元素不是交互式的，这意味着用户无法聚焦，悬停或单击它们来触发工具提示（或弹出窗口）。解决方法是，您需要从包装 <div> 或 <span> 触发工具提示，最好使用 tabindex="0" 将其设置为键盘焦点，并覆盖禁用元素上的 pointer-events 。

trans-unit.source: Elements with the disabled attribute aren’t interactive, meaning users cannot hover or click them to trigger a popover (or tooltip). As a workaround, you’ll want to trigger the popover from a wrapper <div> or <span> and override the pointer-events on the disabled element.
trans-unit.target: 具有 disabled 属性的元素不是交互式的，这意味着用户无法将鼠标悬停或单击它们以触发弹出窗口（或工具提示）。解决方法是，您要从包装 <div> 或 <span> 触发弹出窗口，并覆盖禁用元素上的 pointer-events 。

trans-unit.source: Every Sass variable in Bootstrap 4 includes the !default flag allowing you to override the variable’s default value in your own Sass without modifying Bootstrap’s source code. trans-unit.source: For custom Bootstrap form validation messages, you’ll need to add the novalidate boolean attribute to your <form>. This disables the browser default feedback tooltips, but still provides access to the form validation APIs in JavaScript. Try to submit the form below; our JavaScript will intercept the submit button and relay feedback to you. When attempting to submit, you’ll see the :invalid and :valid styles applied to your form controls.
trans-unit.target: 对于自定义的Bootstrap表单验证消息，您需要将 novalidate 布尔值属性添加到 <form> 。这将禁用浏览器的默认反馈工具提示，但仍提供对JavaScript中的表单验证API的访问。尝试提交以下表格；我们的JavaScript会拦截“提交”按钮并将反馈转发给您。尝试提交时，您将看到 :invalid 和 :valid 样式应用于表单控件。

trans-unit.source: For disabled popover triggers, you may also prefer data-bs-trigger="hover" so that the popover appears as immediate visual feedback to your users as they may not expect to click on a disabled element.
For disabled popover triggers, you may also prefer data-trigger="hover" so that the popover appears as immediate visual feedback to your users as they may not expect to click on a disabled element.
trans-unit.target: 对于禁用的弹出式触发器，您可能还希望使用 data-trigger="hover" 这样，由于用户可能不希望单击禁用的元素，因此该弹出式窗口会立即显示给您的用户视觉反馈。

trans-unit.source: For each table variant, we generate a --bs-table-accent-bg color with the highest contrast depending on that color. For example, the accent color for .table-primary is darker while .table-dark has a lighter accent color.

trans-unit.source: For faster mobile-friendly and responsive development, Bootstrap includes dozens of utility classes for showing, hiding, aligning, and spacing content.
trans-unit.target: 为了更快的移动友好和响应式开发,Bootstrap包含了几十个实用类,用于显示、隐藏、对齐和间隔内容。

trans-unit.source: For faster mobile-friendly development, use responsive display classes for showing and hiding elements by device. Avoid creating entirely different versions of the same site, instead hide elements responsively for each screen size.
trans-unit.target: 为了更快的移动友好开发,使用响应式显示类,按设备显示和隐藏元素。避免为同一个网站创建完全不同的版本,而是为每个屏幕尺寸响应地隐藏元素。

trans-unit.source: For file inputs, swap the .form-control for .form-control-file.
trans-unit.target: 对于文件输入，将 .form-control 交换为 .form-control-file 。

trans-unit.source: For grids that are the same from the smallest of devices to the largest, use the .col and .col-* classes. Specify a numbered class when you need a particularly sized column; otherwise, feel free to stick to .col.
trans-unit.target: 对于从最小的设备到最大的设备相同的网格，请使用 .col 和 .col-* 类。需要特殊大小的列时，请指定编号的类别；否则，请坚持使用 .col 。

trans-unit.source: For improved cross-browser rendering, we use Reboot to correct inconsistencies across browsers and devices while providing slightly more opinionated resets to common HTML elements.
trans-unit.target: 为了改善跨浏览器的呈现，我们使用“ 重新启动”来纠正浏览器和设备之间的不一致，同时为常见的HTML元素提供稍微更多的自觉重置。

trans-unit.source: For indicating sample output from a program use the <samp> tag.
trans-unit.target: 要指示程序的示例输出，请使用 <samp> 标记。

trans-unit.source: For indicating variables use the <var> tag.
trans-unit.target: 要指示变量，请使用 <var> 标记。

trans-unit.source: For left, right, and center alignment, responsive classes are available that use the same viewport width breakpoints as the grid system.
trans-unit.target: 对于左、右和中心对齐,可使用与网格系统相同的视口宽度断点的响应类。

trans-unit.source: For longer content, you can add a .text-truncate class to truncate the text with an ellipsis. Requires display: inline-block or display: block.
trans-unit.target: 对于更长的内容，可以添加 .text-truncate 类以用省略号截断文本。需要 display: inline-block 或 display: block 。

trans-unit.source: For modals that simply appear rather than fade in to view, remove the .fade class from your modal markup.
trans-unit.target: 对于仅显示而不是淡入显示的模态，请从模态标记中删除 .fade 类。

trans-unit.source: For more information and examples on how to modify our Sass maps and variables, please refer to the Sass section of the Grid documentation.
For more information refer to Popper.js's offset docs.
trans-unit.target: 有关更多信息，请参阅Popper.js的offsets 文档。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the WAI-ARIA Authoring Practices for the breadcrumb pattern.
trans-unit.target: 有关更多信息，请参阅面包屑模式的WAI-ARIA创作实践。

trans-unit.source: For more straightforward sizing in CSS, we switch the global box-sizing value from content-box to border-box. This ensures padding does not affect the final computed width of an element, but it can cause problems with some third party software like Google Maps and Google Custom Search Engine.
trans-unit.target: 为了在CSS中更简单地调整大小，我们将全局 box-sizing 值从 content-box 切换到 border-box 。这样可以确保 padding 不会影响元素的最终计算宽度，但是会导致某些第三方软件（例如Google Maps和Google Custom Search Engine）出现问题。

trans-unit.source: For navbars that never collapse, add the .navbar-expand class on the navbar. For navbars that always collapse, don’t add any .navbar-expand class.
trans-unit.target: 对于永不崩溃的导航栏，请在导航栏上添加 .navbar-expand 类。对于始终折叠的导航栏，请不要添加任何 .navbar-expand 类。

trans-unit.source: For prev/next controls, .carousel-control.right and .carousel-control.left are now .carousel-control-next and .carousel-control-prev, meaning they no longer require a specific base class.
trans-unit.target: 对于上一个/下一个控件， .carousel-control.right 和 .carousel-control.left 现在是 .carousel-control-next 和 .carousel-control-prev ，这意味着它们不再需要特定的基类。

trans-unit.source: For proper cross-browser and cross-platform behavior, you must use the <a> tag, not the <button> tag, and you also must include a tabindex attribute.
trans-unit.target: 对于正确的跨浏览器和跨平台的行为，则必须使用 <a> 标签，没有了 <button> 标记，还必须包含 tabindex 属性。

trans-unit.source: For quoting blocks of content from another source within your document. Wrap <blockquote class="blockquote"> around any
trans-unit.target: 用于引用文档中其他来源的内容块。将 <blockquote class="blockquote"> 包裹在任何

trans-unit.source: For safety, the <body> has a declared background-color, defaulting to #fff.
trans-unit.target: 为了安全起见， <body> 具有声明的 background-color ，默认为 #fff 。

trans-unit.source: For simpler styling, clear hierarchy, and better spacing, description lists have updated margins. <dd>s reset margin-left to 0 and add margin-bottom: .5rem. <dt>s are bolded.
trans-unit.target: 为了使样式更简单，层次结构清晰和间距更好，描述列表已更新了 margin 。 <dd> s将 margin-left 重置为 0 并添加 margin-bottom: .5rem 。 <dt> 被加粗。

trans-unit.source: For systems that generate more notifications, consider using a wrapping element so they can easily stack.
trans-unit.target: 对于产生更多通知的系统,可以考虑使用包装元素,这样就可以轻松堆叠。

trans-unit.source: For the accented tables (striped rows, hoverable rows, and active tables), we used some techniques to make these effects work for all our table variants:

For visually hidden interactive controls, such as traditional “skip” links, .sr-only can be combined with the .sr-only-focusable class. This will ensure that the control becomes visible once focused (for sighted keyboard users).
trans-unit.target: 对于视觉上隐藏的交互式控件（例如传统的“跳过”链接）， .sr-only 可以与 .sr-only-focusable 类结合使用。这将确保控件一旦聚焦（对于有视力的键盘用户）就变得可见。

trans-unit.source: For visually hidden interactive controls, such as traditional “skip” links, use the .visually-hidden-focusable class. This will ensure that the control becomes visible once focused (for sighted keyboard users). Watch out, compared to the equivalent .sr-only and .sr-only-focusable classes in past versions, Bootstrap 5’s .visually-hidden-focusable is a standalone class, and must not be used in combination with the .visually-hidden class.

Force your .nav’s contents to extend the full available width one of two modifier classes. To proportionately fill all available space with your .nav-items, use .nav-fill. Notice that all horizontal space is occupied, but not every nav item has the same width.
trans-unit.target: 强制 .nav 的内容扩展两个修饰符类之一的全部可用宽度。要用 .nav-item 按比例填充所有可用空间，请使用 .nav-fill 。请注意，所有水平空间都被占用，但并非每个导航项都具有相同的宽度。

trans-unit.source: Grid

trans-unit.source: Grid breakpoints and container widths are now handled via Sass maps ($grid-breakpoints and $container-max-widths) instead of a handful of separate variables. These replace the @screen-* variables entirely and allow you to fully customize the grid tiers.
trans-unit.target: 网格断点和容器宽度现在通过Sass映射（ $grid-breakpoints 和 $container-max-widths ）处理，而不是通过几个单独的变量来处理。这些将完全替换 @screen-* 变量，并允许您完全自定义网格层。

trans-unit.source: Grid breakpoints are based on minimum width media queries, meaning they apply to that one breakpoint and all those above it (e.g., .col-sm-4 applies to small, medium, large, and extra large devices, but not the first xs breakpoint).
trans-unit.target: 网格断点基于最小宽度的媒体查询，这意味着它们适用于该断点及其上方的所有断点（例如， .col-sm-4 适用于小型，中型，大型和超大型设备，但不适用于第一个 xs 断点）。

trans-unit.source: Gutters
trans-unit.target: Gutters

trans-unit.source: Gutters are the padding between your columns, used to responsively space and align content in the Bootstrap grid system.

Gutters can be responsively adjusted by breakpoint-specific padding and negative margin utility classes. To change the gutters in a given row, pair a negative margin utility on the .row and matching padding utilities on the .cols. The .container or .container-fluid parent may need to be adjusted too to avoid unwanted overflow, using again matching padding utility.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过特定于断点的填充和负余量实用程序类来快速调整装订线。要更改给定行中的 .row ，请将.row上的负边距实用程序与 .col 上的匹配填充实用程序配对。所述 .container 或 .container-fluid 父可能需要太调整，以避免不希望的溢出，再次使用匹配填充效用。

trans-unit.target: HTML

trans-unit.source: HTML form validation is applied via CSS’s two pseudo-classes, :invalid and :valid. It applies to <input>, <select>, and <textarea> elements.
trans-unit.target: HTML表单验证通过CSS的两个伪类 :invalid 和 :valid 进行应用。它适用于 <input> ， <select> 和 <textarea> 元素。

trans-unit.source: HTML5 [hidden] attribute
trans-unit.target: HTML5 [hidden] 属性

trans-unit.source: HTML5 adds a new global attribute named [hidden], which is styled as display: none by default. Borrowing an idea from PureCSS, we improve upon this default by making [hidden] { display: none !important; } to help prevent its display from getting accidentally overridden.

HTML5 adds a new global attribute named [hidden], which is styled as display: none by default. Borrowing an idea from PureCSS, we improve upon this default by making [hidden] { display: none !important; } to help prevent its display from getting accidentally overridden. While [hidden] isn’t natively supported by IE10, the explicit declaration in our CSS gets around that problem.
trans-unit.target: HTML5添加了一个名为 [hidden] 的新全局属性，该属性的样式设置为 display: none 默认情况下为none。从PureCSS借用一个想法，我们通过使 [hidden] { display: none !important; } 以防止其 display 意外被覆盖。尽管IE10本身不支持 [hidden] ，但CSS中的显式声明可以解决该问题。

Hide an element to all devices except screen readers with .sr-only. Combine .sr-only with .sr-only-focusable to show the element again when it’s focused (e.g. by a keyboard-only user). Can also be used as mixins.
trans-unit.target: .sr-only 使用.sr-的屏幕阅读器以外的所有设备隐藏元素。将 .sr-only 和 .sr-only-focusable 结合使用以在元素被聚焦时再次显示该元素（例如，仅键盘用户）。也可以用作mixin。

trans-unit.source: Hides a collapsible element. Returns to the caller before the collapsible element has actually been hidden (e.g., before the hidden.bs.collapse event occurs).
Hides a collapsible element. Returns to the caller before the collapsible element has actually been hidden (i.e. before the hidden.bs.collapse event occurs).
trans-unit.target: 隐藏可折叠元素。在可折叠元素实际被隐藏之前（即在 hidden.bs.collapse 事件发生之前）返回到调用者。

trans-unit.source: Hides an element’s popover. Returns to the caller before the popover has actually been hidden (i.e. before the hidden.bs.popover event occurs). This is considered a “manual” triggering of the popover.
trans-unit.target: 隐藏元素的弹出框。在弹出窗口实际被隐藏之前（即在 hidden.bs.popover 事件发生之前）返回到调用者。这被认为是弹出窗口的“手动”触发。

trans-unit.source: Hides an element’s toast. Returns to the caller before the toast has actually been hidden (i.e. before the hidden.bs.toast event occurs). You have to manually call this method if you made autohide to false.
trans-unit.target: 隐藏元素的吐司。在实际隐藏Toast之前（即在 hidden.bs.toast 事件发生之前）返回到调用者。如果将 autohide 设置为 false ,则必须手动调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: Hides an element’s toast. Your toast will remain on the DOM but won’t show anymore.
trans-unit.target: 隐藏元素的吐司。您的敬酒将保留在DOM上，但不再显示。

trans-unit.source: Hides an element’s tooltip. Returns to the caller before the tooltip has actually been hidden (i.e. before the hidden.bs.tooltip event occurs). This is considered a “manual” triggering of the tooltip.
trans-unit.target: 隐藏元素的工具提示。在工具提示实际被隐藏之前（即在 hidden.bs.tooltip 事件发生之前）返回到调用者。这被认为是工具提示的“手动”触发。

trans-unit.source: In v4 we used a CSS-only technique to mimic the behavior of Masonry-like columns, but this technique came with lots of unpleasant side effects. If you want to have this type of layout in v5, you can just make use of Masonry plugin. Masonry is not included in Bootstrap, but we’ve made a demo example to help you get started.

In Bootstrap 3, theming was largely driven by variable overrides in LESS, custom CSS, and a separate theme stylesheet that we included in our dist files. With some effort, one could completely redesign the look of Bootstrap 3 without touching the core files. Bootstrap 4 provides a familiar, but slightly different approach.
trans-unit.target: 在Bootstrap 3中，主题化主要由LESS中的变量覆盖，自定义CSS和我们包含在 dist 文件中的单独的主题样式表驱动。只要付出一些努力，就可以完全重新设计Bootstrap 3的外观，而无需触及核心文件。Bootstrap 4提供了一种熟悉但略有不同的方法。

trans-unit.source: In Bootstrap 5, we’ve enabled responsive font sizes by default, allowing text to scale more naturally across device and viewport sizes. Have a look at the RFS page to find out how this works.

In CSS, margin properties can utilize negative values (padding cannot). As of 4.2, we’ve added negative margin utilities for every non-zero integer size listed above (e.g., 1, 2, 3, 4, 5). These utilities are ideal for customizing grid column gutters across breakpoints.
trans-unit.target: 在CSS中， margin 属性可以使用负值（ padding 不能）。作为4.2，我们添加负余量的实用程序上面列出的每个非零整数大小（例如， 1 ， 2 ， 3 ， 4 ， 5 ）。这些实用程序非常适合自定义跨断点的网格列装订线。

trans-unit.source: In CSS, margin properties can utilize negative values (padding cannot). These negative margins are disabled by default, but can be enabled in Sass by setting $enable-negative-margins: true.

In Internet Explorer 10, SVG images with .img-fluid are disproportionately sized. To fix this, add width: 100% \9; where necessary. This fix improperly sizes other image formats, so Bootstrap doesn’t apply it automatically.
trans-unit.target: 在Internet Explorer 10中，具有 .img-fluid 的 SVG图像的大小不成比例。要解决此问题，请添加 width: 100% \9; 在必要时。此修复程序无法正确调整其他图像格式的大小，因此Bootstrap不会自动应用它。

trans-unit.source: In a grid layout, content must be placed within columns and only columns may be immediate children of rows.
trans-unit.target: 在网格布局中,内容必须放置在列内,且只有列可以是行的直系子代。

trans-unit.source: In addition, as pages likely have more than one such navigation section, it’s advisable to provide a descriptive aria-label for the <nav> to reflect its purpose. For example, if the pagination component is used to navigate between a set of search results, an appropriate label could be aria-label="Search results pages".
trans-unit.target: 另外，由于页面可能具有多个这样的导航部分，建议为 <nav> 提供一个描述性的 aria-label ，以反映其目的。例如，如果使用分页组件在一组搜索结果之间导航，则适当的标签可以是 aria-label="Search results pages" 。

trans-unit.source: In addition, groups and toolbars should be given an explicit label, as most assistive technologies will otherwise not announce them, despite the presence of the correct role attribute. In the examples provided here, we use aria-label, but alternatives such as aria-labelledby can also be used.
trans-unit.target: 另外，应该给组和工具栏一个明确的标签，因为尽管存在正确的角色属性，但大多数辅助技术都不会宣布它们。在此处提供的示例中，我们使用 aria-label ，但也可以使用诸如 aria-labelledby 的替代方法。

trans-unit.source: In addition, you can also center the elements with the transform utility class .translate-middle.

In browsers where the Page Visibility API is supported, the carousel will avoid sliding when the webpage is not visible to the user (such as when the browser tab is inactive, the browser window is minimized, etc.).
trans-unit.target: 在支持Page Visibility API的浏览器中，当用户看不见网页时，轮播会避免滑动（例如，当浏览器选项卡处于非活动状态，浏览器窗口最小化等）。

trans-unit.source: In need of a button, but not the hefty background colors they bring? Replace the default modifier classes with the .btn-outline-* ones to remove all background images and colors on any button.
trans-unit.target: 需要一个按钮，但是他们不需要带来沉重的背景颜色吗？用 .btn-outline-* 替换默认修饰符类，以删除任何按钮上的所有背景图像和颜色。

trans-unit.source: In order for assistive technologies (such as screen readers) to convey that a series of buttons is grouped, an appropriate role attribute needs to be provided. For button groups, this would be role="group", while toolbars should have a role="toolbar".
trans-unit.target: 为了使辅助技术（例如屏幕阅读器）传达一系列按钮已分组的信息，需要提供适当的 role 属性。对于按钮组，这将是 role="group" ，而工具栏应具有 role="toolbar" 。

trans-unit.source: In order to execute an action once the transition is complete, you can listen to the corresponding event.
trans-unit.target: 为了在过渡完成后执行一个动作,可以监听相应的事件。

trans-unit.source: In order to provide the best possible experience to old and buggy browsers, Bootstrap uses CSS browser hacks in several places to target special CSS to certain browser versions in order to work around bugs in the browsers themselves. These hacks understandably cause CSS validators to complain that they are invalid. In a couple places, we also use bleeding-edge CSS features that aren’t yet fully standardized, but these are used purely for progressive enhancement.
trans-unit.target: 为了给旧的和有漏洞的浏览器提供最佳的体验，Bootstrap 在多个地方使用CSS浏览器黑客，将特殊的CSS定位于某些浏览器版本，以解决浏览器本身中的错误。可以理解，这些黑客使CSS验证程序抱怨它们无效。在几个地方，我们还使用了尚未完全标准化的尖端CSS功能，但这些功能仅用于逐步增强。

trans-unit.source: Input group addons are now specific to their placement relative to an input. We’ve dropped .input-group-addon and .input-group-btn for two new classes, .input-group-prepend and .input-group-append. You must explicitly use an append or a prepend now, simplifying much of our CSS. Within an append or prepend, place your buttons as they would exist anywhere else, but wrap text in .input-group-text.
trans-unit.target: 输入组插件现在特定于它们相对于输入的位置。我们为 .input-group-prepend 和 .input-group-append 两个新类删除了 .input-group-addon 和 .input-group-btn 。您现在必须显式使用一个追加或前置，以简化我们的许多CSS。在追加或前置中，将您的按钮放置在其他位置，但将文本包装在 .input-group-text 中。

trans-unit.source: Internet Explorer 10+ is supported; IE9 and down is not. Please be aware that some CSS3 properties and HTML5 elements are not fully supported in IE10, or require prefixed properties for full functionality. Visit Can I use… for details on browser support of CSS3 and HTML5 features. If you require IE8-9 support, use Bootstrap 3.
trans-unit.target: 支持Internet Explorer 10+； IE9和向下不是。请注意，某些CSS3属性和HTML5元素在IE10中不完全受支持，或者要求使用前缀属性才能具有全部功能。请访问“我可以使用...”以获取有关浏览器对CSS3和HTML5功能的支持的详细信息。如果需要IE8-9支持，请使用Bootstrap 3。

trans-unit.source: Internet Explorer 10-11 do not render inline elements like links or images (or ::before and ::after pseudo-elements) as flex items. The only workaround is to set a non-inline display value (e.g., block, inline-block, or flex). We suggest using .d-flex, one of our display utilities, as an easy fix.
trans-unit.target: Internet Explorer 10-11不会将诸如链接或图像（或 ::before 和 ::after 伪元素）之类的内联元素呈现为弹性项目。唯一的解决方法是设置非内联 display 值（例如， block ， inline-block 或 flex ）。我们建议使用 .d-flex （一种显示工具）作为一种简单的解决方法。

trans-unit.source: Internet Explorer is not supported. If you require Internet Explorer support, please use Bootstrap v4.

Introduced new pointer-events usage on modals. The outer .modal-dialog passes through events with pointer-events: none for custom click handling (making it possible to just listen on the .modal-backdrop for any clicks), and then counteracts it for the actual .modal-content with pointer-events: auto.
trans-unit.target: 在模式上引入了新的 pointer-events 用法。外部 .modal-dialog 通过带有 pointer-events: none 传递：没有用于自定义单击处理的事件（可以仅监听 .modal-backdrop 任何单击），然后使用 pointer-events: auto 抵消它的实际 .modal-content -事件：自动。

trans-unit.source: Make a paragraph stand out by adding .lead.
trans-unit.target: 通过添加 .lead 使段落突出。

trans-unit.source: Make a set of buttons appear vertically stacked rather than horizontally. Split button dropdowns are not supported here.
trans-unit.target: 使一组按钮垂直堆叠而不是水平堆叠。此处不支持拆分按钮下拉菜单。

trans-unit.target: 通过CSS“拉伸”嵌套链接，使任何HTML元素或Bootstrap组件均可点击。

trans-unit.source: Make buttons look inactive by adding the disabled boolean attribute to any <button> element.
trans-unit.target: 通过将 disabled boolean属性添加到任何 <button> 元素，可使按钮看起来不活动。

trans-unit.source: Make buttons look inactive by adding the disabled boolean attribute to any <button> element. Disabled buttons have pointer-events: none applied to, preventing hover and active states from triggering.
Makes an alert listen for click events on descendant elements which have the data-dismiss="alert" attribute. (Not necessary when using the data-api’s auto-initialization.)
trans-unit.target: 使警报监听具有 data-dismiss="alert" 属性的后代元素上的单击事件。（使用data-api的自动初始化时不需要。）

trans-unit.source: Making popovers work for keyboard and assistive technology users
trans-unit.target: 让popovers为键盘和辅助技术用户服务

trans-unit.source: Making tooltips work for keyboard and assistive technology users
trans-unit.target: 让工具提示对键盘和辅助技术用户有用

trans-unit.source: Manually hides a modal. Returns to the caller before the modal has actually been hidden (i.e. before the hidden.bs.modal event occurs).
trans-unit.target: 手动隐藏模式。在模式被实际隐藏之前（即在 hidden.bs.modal 事件发生之前）返回到调用者。

trans-unit.source: Manually opens a modal. Returns to the caller before the modal has actually been shown (i.e. before the shown.bs.modal event occurs).
trans-unit.target: 手动打开模式。在实际显示模式之前（即在 shown.bs.modal 事件发生之前）返回到调用者。

trans-unit.source: Manually readjust the modal’s position if the height of a modal changes while it is open (i.e. in case a scrollbar appears).
trans-unit.target: 如果模态的高度在打开时发生变化，则手动重新调整模态的位置（即，如果出现滚动条）。

trans-unit.source: Manually toggles a modal. Returns to the caller before the modal has actually been shown or hidden (i.e. before the shown.bs.modal or hidden.bs.modal event occurs).
trans-unit.target: 手动切换模态。在模态实际显示或隐藏之前（即在 shown.bs.modal 或 hidden.bs.modal 事件发生之前）返回到调用者。

trans-unit.source: Many of Bootstrap’s components and utilities are built with @each loops that iterate over a Sass map. This is especially helpful for generating variants of a component by our $theme-colors and creating responsive variants for each breakpoint. As you customize these Sass maps and recompile, you’ll automatically see your changes reflected in these loops.
trans-unit.target: Bootstrap的许多组件和实用程序都是通过 @each 循环构建的，这些循环在Sass映射上进行迭代。这对于通过 $theme-colors 生成组件的变体并为每个断点创建响应变体特别有用。自定义这些Sass映射并重新编译时，您将自动看到这些更改反映在这些循环中。

trans-unit.source: Many of Bootstrap’s components are built with a base-modifier class approach. This means the bulk of the styling is contained to a base class (e.g., .btn) while style variations are confined to modifier classes (e.g., .btn-danger). These modifier classes are built from the $theme-colors map to make customizing the number and name of our modifier classes.
trans-unit.target: Bootstrap的许多组件都是使用基本修饰符类方法构建的。这意味着大部分样式包含在基类（例如 .btn ）中，而样式变体则限于修饰符类（例如 .btn-danger ）。这些修饰符类是从 $theme-colors 映射构建的，以自定义修饰符类的数量和名称。

trans-unit.source: Many of Bootstrap’s various components and utilities are built through a series of colors defined in a Sass map. This map can be looped over in Sass to quickly generate a series of rulesets.
trans-unit.target: Bootstrap的许多各种组件和实用程序都是通过Sass映射中定义的一系列颜色构建的。可以在Sass中将此地图循环，以快速生成一系列规则集。

trans-unit.source: Many of our components require the use of JavaScript to function. Specifically, they require jQuery, Popper.js, and our own JavaScript plugins. Place the following <script>s near the end of your pages, right before the closing </body> tag, to enable them. jQuery must come first, then Popper.js, and then our JavaScript plugins.
trans-unit.target: 我们的许多组件都需要使用JavaScript才能起作用。具体来说，它们需要jQuery，Popper.js和我们自己的JavaScript插件。将以下 <script> 放在页面结尾附近，紧靠 </body> 标记之前，以启用它们。jQuery必须首先出现，然后是Popper.js，然后是我们的JavaScript插件。

trans-unit.source: Many of our components require the use of JavaScript to function. Specifically, they require our own JavaScript plugins and Popper. Place one of following <script>s near the end of your pages, right before the closing </body> tag, to enable them.

trans-unit.source: Media objects do not have position: relative by default, so we need to add the .position-relative here to prevent the link from stretching outside the media object.

trans-unit.source: Media queries

Media queries have also changed. Instead of repeating our media query declarations with the same value each time, we now have @include media-breakpoint-up/down/only. Now, instead of writing @media (min-width: @screen-sm-min) { ... }, you can write @include media-breakpoint-up(sm) { ... }.
trans-unit.target: 媒体查询也已更改。现在，我们有了 @include media-breakpoint-up/down/only ，而不是每次都重复具有相同值的媒体查询声明。现在，您可以编写 @include media-breakpoint-up(sm) { ... } ，而不必编写 @media (min-width: @screen-sm-min) { ... } ）{...}。

trans-unit.source: Modals are built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. They’re positioned over everything else in the document and remove scroll from the <body> so that modal content scrolls instead.
trans-unit.target: 使用HTML，CSS和JavaScript构建模态。它们位于文档中所有其他内容的上方，并从 <body> 中移除滚动，从而使模式内容滚动。

trans-unit.source: Modals for displaying, positioning, and scroll behavior
trans-unit.target: 用于显示、定位和滚动行为的模式。

trans-unit.source: Modals have three optional sizes, available via modifier classes to be placed on a .modal-dialog. These sizes kick in at certain breakpoints to avoid horizontal scrollbars on narrower viewports.
trans-unit.target: 模态具有三个可选的大小，可通过修饰符类将其放置在 .modal-dialog 上。这些大小会在某些断点处插入，以避免在较窄的视口上出现水平滚动条。

trans-unit.source: Modals use position: fixed, which can sometimes be a bit particular about its rendering. Whenever possible, place your modal HTML in a top-level position to avoid potential interference from other elements. You’ll likely run into issues when nesting a .modal within another fixed element.
trans-unit.target: 模态使用 position: fixed ，有时可能对其渲染有些特殊。尽可能将模式HTML放在顶级位置，以免受到其他元素的潜在干扰。将 .modal 嵌套在另一个固定元素中时，您可能会遇到问题。

trans-unit.source: Modify existing utilities in the default $utilities map with map-get and map-merge functions. In the example below, we’re adding an additional value to the width utilities. Start with an initial map-merge and then specify which utility you want to modify. From there, fetch the nested "width" map with map-get to access and modify the utility’s options and values.

trans-unit.source: More complex forms can be built using our grid classes. Use these for form layouts that require multiple columns, varied widths, and additional alignment options.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用我们的网格类构建更复杂的表单。对于需要多列、不同宽度和额外的对齐选项的表单布局,可以使用这些类。

trans-unit.source: More complex layouts can also be created with the grid system.
trans-unit.target: 也可以用网格系统创建更复杂的布局。

trans-unit.source: Most colors that currently make up Bootstrap’s default palette—used throughout the framework for things such as button variations, alert variations, form validation indicators—lead to insufficient color contrast (below the recommended WCAG 2.0 color contrast ratio of 4.5:1) when used against a light background. Authors will need to manually modify/extend these default colors to ensure adequate color contrast ratios.
trans-unit.target: 当前，构成Bootstrap默认调色板的大多数颜色（在整个框架中用于按钮变化，警报变化，表单验证指示符）会导致颜色对比度不足（低于WCAG 2.0建议的4.5：1的颜色对比度）。浅色的背景。作者将需要手动修改/扩展这些默认颜色，以确保足够的颜色对比度。

trans-unit.source: Most custom components do not have position: relative by default, so we need to add the .position-relative here to prevent the link from stretching outside the parent element.
Move columns to the right using .offset-md-* classes. These classes increase the left margin of a column by * columns. For example, .offset-md-4 moves .col-md-4 over four columns.
trans-unit.target: 使用 .offset-md-* 类将列向右移动。这些类将 * 列增加一列的左边距。例如， .offset-md-4 将 .col-md-4 移动到四列上。

trans-unit.source: Moved all .text- utilities to the _utilities.scss file.
trans-unit.target: 将所有 .text- 实用程序移至 _utilities.scss 文件。

trans-unit.source: Moved element resets to the _reboot.scss file.
trans-unit.target: 移动的元素将重置为 _reboot.scss 文件。

trans-unit.source: Moving from Beta 3 to our stable v4.x release, there are no breaking changes, but there are some notable changes.

trans-unit.source: Navbar for extending our Collapse plugin to implement responsive behavior
trans-unit.target: Navbar用于扩展我们的Collapse插件以实现响应行为。

trans-unit.source: Navbar links must have resolvable id targets. For example, a <a href="#home">home</a> must correspond to something in the DOM like <div id="home"></div>.
trans-unit.target: 导航栏链接必须具有可解析的ID目标。例如， <a href="#home">home</a> 必须与DOM中的类似 <div id="home"></div> 东西相对应。

trans-unit.source: Navbar navigation links build on our .nav options with their own modifier class and require the use of toggler classes for proper responsive styling. Navigation in navbars will also grow to occupy as much horizontal space as possible to keep your navbar contents securely aligned.
trans-unit.target: Navbar导航链接以我们的 .nav 选项及其自己的修饰符类为基础，并且需要使用切换器类来进行适当的响应式样式。导航栏中的导航也将不断扩大，以占据尽可能多的水平空间，以使导航栏内容安全对齐。

trans-unit.source: Navbar togglers are left-aligned by default, but should they follow a sibling element like a .navbar-brand, they’ll automatically be aligned to the far right. Reversing your markup will reverse the placement of the toggler. Below are examples of different toggle styles.
trans-unit.target: 导航栏切换器默认情况下是左对齐的，但是如果它们跟随 .navbar-brand 之类的兄弟元素，它们将自动对齐到最右端。反转标记将反转切换器的位置。以下是不同切换样式的示例。

trans-unit.target: 导航条:颜色方案

trans-unit.target: 导航栏:容器

trans-unit.target: 导航条:位置

trans-unit.target: 导航条:响应行为

trans-unit.source: Navbar: supported content
trans-unit.target: 导航条:支持的内容

trans-unit.source: Navbars and their contents are fluid by default. Change the container to limit their horizontal width in different ways.
Navbars and their contents are fluid by default. Use optional containers to limit their horizontal width.
trans-unit.target: 导航栏及其内容默认情况下是流畅的。使用可选容器限制其水平宽度。

trans-unit.source: Navbars are hidden by default when printing. Force them to be printed by adding .d-print to the .navbar. See the display utility class.
trans-unit.target: 打印时，导航栏默认为隐藏。通过将 .d-print 添加到 .navbar 来强制打印它们。请参阅显示实用程序类。

trans-unit.source: Navbars are responsive by default, but you can easily modify them to change that. Responsive behavior depends on our Collapse JavaScript plugin.
trans-unit.target: Navbars默认是响应的,但你可以很容易地修改它们来改变这一点。响应行为取决于我们的Collapse JavaScript插件。

trans-unit.source: Navbars can use .navbar-toggler, .navbar-collapse, and .navbar-expand{-sm|-md|-lg|-xl|-xxl} classes to determine when their content collapses behind a button. In combination with other utilities, you can easily choose when to show or hide particular elements.

Navbars can utilize .navbar-toggler, .navbar-collapse, and .navbar-expand{-sm|-md|-lg|-xl} classes to change when their content collapses behind a button. In combination with other utilities, you can easily choose when to show or hide particular elements.
trans-unit.target: 导航栏可以使用 .navbar-toggler ， .navbar-collapse 和 .navbar-expand{-sm|-md|-lg|-xl} 类在内容折叠到按钮后时进行更改。与其他实用程序结合使用，您可以轻松选择何时显示或隐藏特定元素。

trans-unit.source: Navbars come with built-in support for a handful of sub-components. Choose from the following as needed:
trans-unit.target: Navbars内置了对一些子组件的支持。根据需要,可以从下面的组件中选择。

trans-unit.source: Navbars may contain bits of text with the help of .navbar-text. This class adjusts vertical alignment and horizontal spacing for strings of text.
trans-unit.target: 导航栏可以在 .navbar-text 的帮助下包含一些文本。此类调整文本字符串的垂直对齐和水平间距。

trans-unit.source: Navbars no longer include margin-bottom or border-radius by default. Use utilities as necessary.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，导航栏不再包括 margin-bottom 或 border-radius 。根据需要使用实用程序。

trans-unit.source: Navbars now require a background declaration of some kind. Choose from our background utilities (.bg-*) or set your own with the light/inverse classes above for mad customization.
trans-unit.target: 导航栏现在需要某种背景声明。从我们的后台实用程序（ .bg-* ）中进行选择，或使用上面的light / inverse类设置您自己的样式，以进行疯狂的自定义。

trans-unit.source: Nearly all Bootstrap plugins can be enabled and configured through HTML alone with data attributes (our preferred way of using JavaScript functionality). Be sure to only use one set of data attributes on a single element (e.g., you cannot trigger a tooltip and modal from the same button.)

trans-unit.source: New to Bootstrap 4 is the Reboot, a new stylesheet that builds on Normalize with our own somewhat opinionated reset styles. Selectors appearing in this file only use elements—there are no classes here. This isolates our reset styles from our component styles for a more modular approach. Some of the most important resets this includes are the box-sizing: border-box change, moving from em to rem units on many elements, link styles, and many form element resets.
trans-unit.target: Bootstrap 4 的新功能是Reboot，它是一个新样式表，它基于Normalize并带有我们自己一些固执己见的重置样式。此文件中出现的选择器仅使用元素-此处没有类。这将我们的重置样式与我们的组件样式隔离开来，从而提供了一种更加模块化的方法。包括 box-sizing: border-box 在内的一些最重要的重置包括：边框更改，在许多元素上从 em 到 rem 单位移动，链接样式以及许多表单元素重置。

trans-unit.source: New utilities can be added to the default $utilities map with a map-merge. Make sure our _utilities.scss is imported first, then use the map-merge to add your additional utilities. For example, here’s how to add a responsive cursor utility with three values.

No base font-size is declared on the <html>, but 16px is assumed (the browser default). font-size: 1rem is applied on the <body> for easy responsive type-scaling via media queries while respecting user preferences and ensuring a more accessible approach.
trans-unit.target: 在 <html> 上未声明基本 font-size ，但假定为 16px （浏览器默认值）。 font-size: 1rem 应用于 <body> ，可通过媒体查询轻松响应类型缩放，同时尊重用户首选项并确保更易于访问的方法。

trans-unit.source: No base font-size is declared on the <html>, but 16px is assumed (the browser default). font-size: 1rem is applied on the <body> for easy responsive type-scaling via media queries while respecting user preferences and ensuring a more accessible approach. This browser default can be overridden by modifying the $font-size-root variable.

trans-unit.source: Note that because the font stack includes emoji fonts, many common symbol/dingbat unicode characters will be rendered as multi-colored pictographs. Their appearance will vary, depending on the style used in the browser/platform’s native emoji font, and they won’t be affected by any CSS color styles.
Note that closing an alert will remove it from the DOM.

trans-unit.source: Note that content should not be larger than the height of the image. If content is larger than the image the content will be displayed outside the image.
trans-unit.target: 注意,内容不能大于图像的高度。如果内容大于图像,内容将显示在图像之外。

trans-unit.source: Note that depending on how they are used, badges may be confusing for users of screen readers and similar assistive technologies. While the styling of badges provides a visual cue as to their purpose, these users will simply be presented with the content of the badge. Depending on the specific situation, these badges may seem like random additional words or numbers at the end of a sentence, link, or button.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,根据徽章的使用方式,徽章可能会让屏幕阅读器和类似辅助技术的用户感到困惑。虽然徽章的样式提供了关于其目的的视觉提示,但这些用户只会看到徽章的内容。根据具体情况,这些徽章可能看起来像句子、链接或按钮末尾的随机附加词或数字。

trans-unit.source: Note that dynamic tabbed interfaces should not contain dropdown menus, as this causes both usability and accessibility issues. From a usability perspective, the fact that the currently displayed tab’s trigger element is not immediately visible (as it’s inside the closed dropdown menu) can cause confusion. From an accessibility point of view, there is currently no sensible way to map this sort of construct to a standard WAI ARIA pattern, meaning that it cannot be easily made understandable to users of assistive technologies.
trans-unit.target: 需要注意的是动态的标签式界面应该不包含下拉菜单，因为这会导致可用性和可访问性问题。从可用性的角度来看，当前显示的选项卡的触发元素不是立即可见的（因为它位于关闭的下拉菜单中），这可能会引起混乱。从可访问性的角度来看，目前没有明智的方式将这种构造映射到标准WAI ARIA模式，这意味着辅助技术的用户无法轻易理解它。

trans-unit.source: Note that for security reasons the sanitize, sanitizeFn and whiteList options cannot be supplied using data attributes.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，出于安全原因，不能使用数据属性提供 sanitize ， sanitizeFn 和 whiteList 选项。

trans-unit.source: Note that for security reasons the sanitize, sanitizeFn, and allowList options cannot be supplied using data attributes.
Note that if you add <tr>s as direct children of a table, those <tr> will be wrapped in a <tbody> by default, thus making our selectors work as intended.

Note that navigation bars, even if visually styled as tabs with the .nav-tabs class, should not be given role="tablist", role="tab" or role="tabpanel" attributes. These are only appropriate for dynamic tabbed interfaces, as described in the WAI ARIA Authoring Practices. See JavaScript behavior for dynamic tabbed interfaces in this section for an example.
trans-unit.target: 需要注意的是导航栏，即使在视觉风格与标签 .nav-tabs 类，应该不会给予 role="tablist" ， role="tab" 或 role="tabpanel" 属性。如WAI ARIA创作实践中所述，它们仅适用于动态选项卡式界面。有关示例，请参阅本节中的动态选项卡式界面的JavaScript行为。

trans-unit.source: Note that navigation bars, even if visually styled as tabs with the .nav-tabs class, should not be given role="tablist", role="tab" or role="tabpanel" attributes. These are only appropriate for dynamic tabbed interfaces, as described in the WAI ARIA Authoring Practices. See JavaScript behavior for dynamic tabbed interfaces in this section for an example. The aria-current attribute is not necessary on dynamic tabbed interfaces since our JavaScript handles the selected state by adding aria-selected="true" on the active tab.
Note that pre-checked buttons require you to manually add the .active class to the input’s <label>.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，预先检查的按钮要求您手动将 .active 类添加到输入的 <label> 中。

trans-unit.source: Note that since browsers do not currently support range context queries, we work around the limitations of min- and max- prefixes and viewports with fractional widths (which can occur under certain conditions on high-dpi devices, for instance) by using values with higher precision for these comparisons.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，由于浏览器当前不支持范围上下文查询，因此，我们使用具有较高宽度的值来解决 min- 和 max- 前缀以及视口宽度的限制（具有小数宽度（例如，在某些条件下在高dpi的设备上可能发生））。这些比较的精度。

trans-unit.source: Note that the changes to the grid breakpoints in v4 means that you’ll need to go one breakpoint larger to achieve the same results. The new responsive utility classes don’t attempt to accommodate less common cases where an element’s visibility can’t be expressed as a single contiguous range of viewport sizes; you will instead need to use custom CSS in such cases.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，对v4中的网格断点所做的更改意味着您需要增大一个断点才能获得相同的结果。新的响应实用程序类不会尝试适应不太常见的情况，即元素的可见性不能表示为视口尺寸的单个连续范围；在这种情况下，您将需要使用自定义CSS。

trans-unit.source: Note that the live region needs to be present in the markup before the toast is generated or updated. If you dynamically generate both at the same time and inject them into the page, they will generally not be announced by assistive technologies.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，在生成或更新Toast 之前，必须在标记中包含实时区域。如果您同时动态生成两者并将它们注入页面，则辅助技术通常不会宣布它们。

trans-unit.source: Note that the other features of the plugin (button checkboxes, button radios, single-toggle buttons) have been retained in v4.
trans-unit.target: 需要注意的是,插件的其他功能(按钮复选框、按钮收音机、单次切换按钮)在v4中得到了保留。

trans-unit.source: Note that we don’t provide utility classes for justified text. While, aesthetically, justified text might look more appealing, it does make word-spacing more random and therefore harder to read.
Note that you don’t need to add a data-bs-display="static" attribute to dropdown buttons in navbars, since Popper isn’t used in navbars.
Note that you don’t need to add a data-display="static" attribute to dropdown buttons in navbars, since Popper.js isn’t used in navbars.

trans-unit.source: Note when boundary is set to any value other than 'scrollParent', the style position: static is applied to the .dropdown container.
trans-unit.target: 注意当 boundary 被设置为以外的值 'scrollParent' ，风格 position: static 应用到 .dropdown 容器。

trans-unit.source: Now that you’re familiar with how the utilities API works, learn how to add your own custom classes and modify our default utilities.

trans-unit.source: On <select> elements, the Android stock browser will not display the side controls if there is a border-radius and/or border applied. (See this StackOverflow question for details.) The user agent sniffing avoids interference with Chrome, Safari, and Mozilla browsers.

trans-unit.source: On touch-enabled devices, opening a dropdown adds empty ($.noop) mouseover handlers to the immediate children of the <body> element. This admittedly ugly hack is necessary to work around a quirk in iOS’ event delegation, which would otherwise prevent a tap anywhere outside of the dropdown from triggering the code that closes the dropdown. Once the dropdown is closed, these additional empty mouseover handlers are removed.
trans-unit.target: 在启用触摸的设备上，打开下拉列表会将空（ $.noop ） mouseover 处理程序添加到 <body> 元素的直接子代中。要解决iOS事件委托中的一个怪癖，必须承认这种丑陋的骇客是必须的，否则它将阻止下拉菜单之外的任何地方的点击触发触发关闭下拉菜单的代码。关闭下拉菜单后，将删除这些其他的空 mouseover 处理程序。

trans-unit.source: On touch-enabled devices, opening a dropdown adds empty mouseover handlers to the immediate children of the <body> element. This admittedly ugly hack is necessary to work around a quirk in iOS' event delegation, which would otherwise prevent a tap anywhere outside of the dropdown from triggering the code that closes the dropdown. Once the dropdown is closed, these additional empty mouseover handlers are removed.

Our bootstrap.bundle.js and bootstrap.bundle.min.js include Popper, but not jQuery. For more information about what’s included in Bootstrap, please see our contents section.
trans-unit.target: 我们的 bootstrap.bundle.js 和 bootstrap.bundle.min.js 包含Popper，但不包含jQuery。有关Bootstrap中包含的内容的更多信息，请参见我们的内容部分。

trans-unit.source: Our HTML docs likewise have some trivial and inconsequential HTML validation warnings due to our inclusion of a workaround for a certain Firefox bug.

trans-unit.source: Our approach to building RTL support into Bootstrap comes with two important decisions that impact how we write and use our CSS:
Our default .container class is a responsive, fixed-width container, meaning its max-width changes at each breakpoint.
trans-unit.target: 我们的默认 .container 类是一个响应式，固定宽度的容器，这意味着它的 max-width 在每个断点处都会变化。

trans-unit.source: Our default modal without modifier class constitutes the “medium” size modal.
trans-unit.target: 我们不带修饰符类别的默认模态构成“中等”尺寸的模态。

trans-unit.source: Our dropdowns, popovers and tooltips also depend on Popper.
Our responsive utility classes have largely been removed in favor of explicit display utilities.
trans-unit.target: 我们的响应实用程序类在很大程度上已删除，转而使用显式 display 实用程序。

trans-unit.source: Out of the box, Android 4.1 (and even some newer releases apparently) ship with the Browser app as the default web browser of choice (as opposed to Chrome). Unfortunately, the Browser app has lots of bugs and inconsistencies with CSS in general.

trans-unit.source: Page zooming inevitably presents rendering artifacts in some components, both in Bootstrap and the rest of the web. Depending on the issue, we may be able to fix it (search first and then open an issue if need be). However, we tend to ignore these as they often have no direct solution other than hacky workarounds.
trans-unit.target: 页面缩放不可避免地在一些组件中呈现渲染伪影,无论是在Bootstrap中还是在Web的其他部分。根据问题的不同,我们也许能够修复它(先搜索,然后在需要时打开一个问题)。然而,我们倾向于忽略这些问题,因为除了黑客工作法之外,它们往往没有直接的解决方案。

trans-unit.source: Place Bootstrap’s checkboxes and radios within list group items and customize as needed. You can use them without <label>s, but please remember to include an aria-label attribute and value for accessibility.
Place a .btn-group within another .btn-group when you want dropdown menus mixed with a series of buttons.
trans-unit.target: 当您想要将下拉菜单与一系列按钮混合在一起时，请将一个 .btn-group 放在另一个 .btn-group 。

trans-unit.source: Place any checkbox or radio option within an input group’s addon instead of text.
trans-unit.target: 将任何复选框或单选选项放在输入组的插件中，而不是文本中。

trans-unit.source: Place any freeform text within a dropdown menu with text and use spacing utilities. Note that you’ll likely need additional sizing styles to constrain the menu width.
trans-unit.target: 将任意格式的文本放在带有文本的下拉菜单中，并使用间距实用程序。请注意，您可能需要其他调整样式来限制菜单宽度。

trans-unit.source: Place one add-on or button on either side of an input. You may also place one on both sides of an input. Remember to place <label>s outside the input group.
trans-unit.target: 将一个附加组件或按钮放在输入的两侧。您也可以在输入的两侧放置一个。请记住将 <label> 放置在输入组之外。

trans-unit.source: Place toasts with custom CSS as you need them. The top right is often used for notifications, as is the top middle. If you’re only ever going to show one toast at a time, put the positioning styles right on the .toast.
trans-unit.target: 根据需要使用自定义CSS放置烤面包。右上角通常用于通知，顶部中间也是如此。如果您一次只显示一个祝酒词，请将定位样式放在 .toast 上。

trans-unit.source: Place various form controls and components within a navbar with .form-inline.
trans-unit.target: 使用 .form-inline 将各种表单控件和组件放置在导航栏中。
